thread.section_title: Jacksonville sports news - Jacksonville.com and The Florida Times-Union
thread.title: Area Golf Scorecard

author: Staff
title: Area Golf Scorecard
text:
Sat, Oct 17, 2015 @ 9:12 pm 
HOT SHOTS 
Holes-in-one: Windy Harbor — Louis Bone, No. 7, 127 yards, 7-iron. Magnolia Point — Don Burden, No. 17, 111 yards, 9-iron. 
Age-shooters: San Jose — Jim Knutzen 67 (age 71). Windy Harbor — Charlie Davis 71 (age 72). NAS Jacksonville — Jerry Hansen 73 (age 73). 
RESULTS 
Areawide 
Men 
NE Florida Seniors: At Prestwick G&CC — Flight A, gross, 1. Tom Loney 75; net, 1. Larry Krestalude 68, 2. Rasheed Ali 71, 3. Cecil Slaughter 71. Flight B, gross, 1. William Purse 82; net, 1. Ron Bourcy 67, 2. Mike Carney 69, 3. David Tiernan 72. Flight C, gross, 1. Larry McKenzie 79; net, 1. Vito Delucia 66, 2. Charlie Flynn 68, 3. Richard Valorose 69, 4. Greg Wynn 69. Flight D, gross, 1. Bob Abraham 84; net, 1. Gordon Patrick 68, 2. Darwin Kubasiewicz 68, 3. Tom Scherch 69. Flight E, gross, 1. Jim Marshall 77; net, 1. Steve Hink 67, 2. Wade Carroll 68, 3. Michael Pasiecki 69. 
Women 
Beaches Association: First round, Anniversary Cup, at St. Johns G&CC (low net) — Flight 1, 1. Paula Fairley 72, 2. Jennifer Eckensberger 76, 3. Mary McCann 77. Flight 2, 1. Sach Price 70, 2. Lynn Strong 71, 3. Debbie Peterson 73. Flight 3, 1. Norma Bell 70, 2. Beatriz Coles 72, 3. Pat Tancredi 73. Flight 4, 1. Joyce Moore 73, 2. Jane Mai 74, 3. Phyllis Bucsko 75. Flight 5, 1. Dale Topolski 64, 2. Jackie Newman 66, 3. Linda Doran 76. Flight 6, 1. Indu Sapra 67, 2. Barbara Castorina 74, 3. Ruth Mathews 78. Flight 7, 1. Barbara Johnson 68, 2. Shirley Germer 78, 3. Roe Fitzgerald 79. 
Jacksonville Association: Second round, handicap tournament, at Ommi Resort Oak Marsh — Championship flight, Joan Rump d. Karen 19 holes; Carlene Caroccio d. Sue Riegler default. Consolation, Angelita Baker d. Linda Yow 4 and 3; Donna Fiedorowics d. Annie White 4 and 3. Flight 1. Shari Zeimets d. Faye Shepherd 8 and 7; Helen Short d, Chris Hunt 3 and 2. Consolation, Paula Fairley d. Carol Newburger 3 and 2; Mary Tappmeyer d. Carol Williams 4 and 3. Flight 2, Andi Phillips d. Jennifer Eckensberger 1-up; Debra McDermott d. Cindy Peterson 1-up. Consolation, Sue Landsdell d. Linda Trunick default; Terry Wensell d. Suzanne Laplante 4 and 3. Flight 3, Betty White d. Beatriz Cole 2 and 1; Kathleen Walker d. Cindy Gates 5 and 4. Consolation, Carin Green d. Eve Goeddel 4 and 2; Emily Brown d. Debra Gardner 3 and 1. Flight 4, Kathi Keller d. Marilyn Becker 2 and 1; Bertha Frazier d. Delores Adams 21 holes. Consolation, Chris Moyer, bye; Judy Ford d. Diane Gifford 1-up. Flight 5, Marguerite Gilliam d. B.J. Murphy 2-up; Cherie Billing d. Joyce Moore 19 holes. Consolation, Jane Casper, bye; Sally Leonard d. Polly Wise 19 holes. 
North Florida Junior Tour: Junior member-guest, at Hyde Park — 16-18 boys, 1. Ashin Chadha 72, 2. Kyle Jewett 75, 3. Colin Dzion 77, 4. Jay Adams 78, 5. Nate MacKay 79. 13-18 girls, 1. Chloe Schiavone 76, 2. Tori Mouton 82, 3. Marissa Cardenas 86, T4. Reni Jancsik, Victoria Greene 88. 13-15 Elite Tour boys, 1. Jason Duff 79, 2. Parker Miller 79, 2. Carter Lewis 80, 4. Tyler Broadhaus 89.13-15 Rising Tour boys, 1. Jake Lytle 79, 2. Jacob Saarela 79, 3. Jacob Godwin 80, T4. Tristan Mihalich, Hunter Boahn 82. 10-12 boys, 1. Lucas Slayden 82, 2. Connor Winter 85, 3. Danny Erickson 85, T4. Colin Lytle, Andrew Davis 87. Foundation boys, 1. Avery Erwin 47, 2. Rocket Delakskyy 51, 3. Joseph Antonacci 65, 4. Spencer Lewis 67, 5. Jackson Brannam 84. Foundation girls, 1. Katilyn Schroeder 48, 2. Alyzabeth Morgan 55, 3. Angelica Pettry 62. 
Associations 
Women 
Fleming Island: Fairways, greens and pars; pas or putts (points) — Putts, T1. Andi Phillips, Debbie Orechia, Terrie Taylor 34. Fairways, Greens and pars, T1. Emily Brown, Lorraine Majewski 80. 
Blue Sky: Grandmothers tournament (low net) — First flight, 1. Hee Hyang Kim 70, 2. Jinny Hwang 71; low grandmother, MiWon Park 73. Second flight, 1. Chong Kim 73, 2. Karen Vanetti 75. 
Magnolia Point : Irish 4-Ball — 1. Hyun Coffman, Virgene Wildner, Penny Lynn, Kathy Friddle 97. 2. Joanne Montzka, Phyllis Boyd, Cheryle Newman, Sally Finneran 93. 
Bent Creek: Low Net — 1. Younghee Lee 61, 2. Nan Hui Simons 67, T3. Joanne Gorshek, Connie Manning 69. 
Men 
Westside seniors: Captain’s choice, at Bent Creek — 1. Chuck Halterman, Tom Poole, Bob Wallace, Rudy Rauco 60. 2. Jack Fattes, Roger Cloutier, Gary Andriesse, Don Young 61. 3. Barry Joy, Dave Williams, Benny Boatright 63. T4. Chris Stone, Bob Hall, Martin Brown, Dave Fullwood; Jon Coleman, Phil Lowell, Tom Young, Bob McCracken; Prince Phillips, Ted Mullinex, John Pataki, Austin Wilson 64. 
UPCOMING 
Sunday: North Florida Junior Golf Foundation Oak Marsh Challenge, Omni Amelia. Visit www.NFJG.org . 
Oct. 25: North Florida Junior Golf Foundation King & Bear Open. Visit www.NFJG.org . 
Oct. 26: Florida-Georgia Windows and Doors Classic, Amelia National. Proceeds benefit North Florida Junior Tour. 
Oct. 26-27: 13th annual Flagler Women’s Golf Fall Slam, Marsh Creek. 
Oct. 28-30: 36th annual Georgia-Florida Tournament, Jekyll Island, Ga. Visit jekyllisland.com and click on events for information. 
Oct. 29-31: Fifth annual Desire Cup Weekend, Ponte Vedra Inn and Club, hosted by Heisman Trophy winner Danny Wuerffel. Proceeds to benefit Desire Street Ministries. For information, visit www.desirestreet.org . 
Nov. 2: 13th annual Jacksonville Area Golf Association Scholarship Golf Classic, Ponte Vedra Inn and Club. Visit www.jaxareagolf.org; 8th annual Newman’s Own Challenge Classic, Fleming Island. Proceeds go to residential program and independent living opportunities for the disabled. Call (904) 284-9859. 
Submit items by faxing (904) 359-4147 or e-mailing garry.smits@jacksonville.com . For complete golf calendar, visit www.jacksonville.com/sports/golf . Information on holes-in-one, eagle-twos and double-eagles must include the course, hole number, yardage and club selection. Tournament results must include first and last names, format and scores, and indicate whether scores are gross or net.
